Kelp is an innovative project aimed at constructing personalized small language models. These models are designed to cater to both individuals and businesses, providing them with a tailored language processing solution. The project's primary goal is to ensure privacy and customization, making it a unique tool in the realm of language models. Please note, this information is based on the context provided and does not involve any external factors or locations such as New York City.
Elamparithi Kavi Elango, who holds an MS in Management & Systems from New York University, is the esteemed founder of Kelp.
